name: Quinn Wheeler
_review: This is my first time trying this brand ice creams after hearing so many positive reviews on it and I gotta say that I was disappointed.

name: Maribel Jackson
_review: Lots of nice, thick chocolate - I could really care less about the ice cream, but the chocolate is divine. This stuff is outrageously fattening though. And very habit-forming, so beware!

name: Kirk Carver
_review: Probably the yummiest ice cream I've ever inhaled!! Very interesting idea to totally surround the ice cream with a hard chocolate shell. It gives you more time to come to your senses and not eat the whole pint in one sitting

name: Jackie Munoz
_review: The Ice Creams are fresh and really tasty.The staff is courteous too. Amidst the array of flavors, the season specials are THE best

name: Grant Murray
_review: I love this ice cream. It feels rich with flavor without the 'imported from France' priceline that normally follows. I scarcely eat ice cream, so obviously I don't know heavy differences; however, when I do, I have enjoyed this one thoroughly.

name: Craft Kim
_review: We savored this!! The smoothest chocolate Iâ€™ve ever had on ice cream!!
